name: Venture Valley
summary: Venture Valley is an esports-style multiplayer game that lets you pit your business savvy against friends and competitors. Slam down cards that will leave your opponents scrambling to deal with their muddling effects - or use the cards to bolster your own enterprises! Build your empire from scratch, starting with a dog walking business. Then, grow it by creating a successful mini-golf, pizza parlor, drone delivery service, robot factory, and other exciting companies. Earn money and reinvest in your hustle by upgrading your HQ, showing everyone who’s really the boss!
